member.summary: Get or Set the DeviceID. Set this property prior to suggest a default selection. The chooser will then attempt to match one of the installed drivers and will preselect it in the combo box if a match is found. If the supplied DeviceID does not match any installed device, it is ignored. Read this property to retrieve the user's device selection.
